Introduction/O ''/O The/O increasing/O need/O for/O trustworthy/O distribution/O of/O digital/O multimedia/O in/O business/O ,/O industry/O ,/O defense/O etc./O has/O lead/O to/O the/O concept/O of/O content-based/O authentication/O ./O

Orthogonal/M Polynomials/M Based/M Transformation/M The/O Discrete/O Cosine/O Transform/O and/O Discrete/O Wavelet/O Transform/O are/O the/O most/O widely/O used/O transforms/O for/O image/O authentication/O ./O

Once/O the/O message/O is/O received/O on/O its/O fly/O to/O the/O destination/O ,/O the/O receiver/O has/O to/O verify/O the/O signature/O -LRB-/O s/O -RRB-/O first/O before/O updating/O its/O routing/O table/O ./O 
According/O to/O the/O operation/O of/O ARAN/O ,/O receivers/O are/O required/O to/O be/O classified/O into/O two/O different/O categories/O ./O 
Receivers/O that/O are/O only/O one-hop/O away/O from/O the/O originator/O of/O the/O RREQ/M or/O RREP/O fall/O into/O the/O first/O category/O and/O those/O are/O more/O than/O one-hop/O away/O are/O referred/O to/O the/O second/O category/O ./O 
The/O reason/O is/O that/O receivers/O in/O different/O category/O incur/O different/O computational/O cost/O in/O terms/O of/O number/O of/O signature/O verifications/O ./O 
Being/O a/O receiver/O in/O the/O first/O category/O ,/O which/O means/O node/O is/O only/O one-hop/O away/O from/O the/O originator/O of/O RREQ/O or/O RREP/O ,/O node/O is/O required/O to/O do/O two/O times/O of/O signature/O verifications/O if/O the/O routing/O message/O comes/O from/O the/O originator/O of/O the/O RREQ/M or/O RREP/O ./O 
The/O first/O signature/O verification/O is/O used/O for/O verifying/O the/O certificate/O of/O the/O originator/O of/O RREQ/M or/O RREP/M and/O obtaining/O the/O public/O key/O of/O the/O originator/O ./O 
The/O second/O one/O is/O required/O to/O verify/O the/O signature/O of/O the/O originator/O by/O using/O the/O public/O key/O of/O the/O originator/O ./O 
However/O ,/O the/O node/O still/O needs/O to/O perform/O four/O times/O of/O signature/O verifications/O should/O the/O routing/O message/O come/O from/O node/O other/O than/O the/O originator/O of/O RREQ/M or/O RREP/O ./O 
In/O contrast/O to/O the/O node/O being/O a/O receiver/O in/O the/O first/O category/O ,/O node/O in/O the/O second/O category/O experiences/O four/O times/O of/O signature/O verifications/O when/O receives/O a/O RREQ/M or/O RREP/M from/O its/O onehop/O neighbor/O ./O 
In/O addition/O to/O two/O times/O of/O signature/O verifications/O described/O in/O the/O last/O paragraph/O ,/O another/O extra/O two/O times/O of/O signature/O verifications/O are/O a/O must/O due/O to/O the/O verification/O of/O both/O certificate/O and/O signature/O of/O the/O node/O from/O which/O it/O receives/O the/O RREQ/M or/O RREP/O ./O 
Now/O the/O computation/O cost/O in/O terms/O of/O number/O of/O signature/O generation/O and/O verification/O can/O be/O derived/O and/O given/O below/O ./O 
Signature/O Gen/O -LRB-/O ×/O Signature/O -LRB-/O Receivers/O that/O are/O more/O than/O one-hop/O away/O from/O the/O originator/O of/O RREQ/M or/O RREP/M -RRB-/O Therefore/O ,/O the/O computation/O cost/O for/O an/O established/O route/O of/O N/O nodes/O between/O source/O S/O and/O destination/O D/O is/O expressed/O as/O ?/O Hop/O Count/O -RRB-/O +2/O ×/O Signatue/O V/O er/O The/O equation/O indicates/O that/O as/O the/O total/O number/O of/O nodes/O on/O the/O finalized/O route/O increase/O ,/O more/O hash/O operations/O and/O signature/O verifications/O are/O required/O to/O be/O performed/O during/O the/O route/O set/O up/O process/O ./O 
3/O -RRB-/O SEAODV/O The/O computation/O cost/O of/O SEAODV/O is/O simple/O and/O straightforward/O in/O contrast/O to/O that/O of/O ARAN/O and/O SAODV/O ./O 
In/O SEAODV/O ,/O the/O computation/O cost/O involved/O to/O every/O node/O on/O the/O route/O is/O exactly/O the/O same/O whenever/O the/O node/O acts/O to/O be/O a/O sender/O or/O a/O receiver/O ./O 
The/O computation/O cost/O for/O a/O finalized/O route/O with/O N/O nodes/O can/O be/O deduced/O 2/O ×/O -LRB-/O N/O ?/O 2/O -RRB-/O ×/O 2/O ×/O M/O AC/O +2/O ×/O 2/O ×/O M/O AC/O ./O 
In/O this/O equation/O ,/O our/O scheme/O only/O involves/O the/O operation/O of/O MAC/O and/O with/O no/O signature/O at/O all/O ./O 
In/O this/O part/O ,/O three/O secure/O routing/O protocols/O -LRB-/O ARAN/O ,/O SAODV/O and/O SEAODV/O -RRB-/O are/O evaluated/O in/O terms/O of/O computation/O cost/O ./O 
The/O computation/O cost/O for/O computing/O signature/O ,/O hash/M operation/M and/O MAC/O are/O listed/O in/O By/O applying/O the/O cryptographic/O costs/O from/O @BULLET/O Computation/O cost/O is/O computed/O in/O terms/O of/O timing/O expense/O in/O millisecond/O ,/O indicates/O that/O SEAODV/O performs/O excellent/O in/O authentication/O latency/O due/O to/O its/O efficient/O cryptographic/O operation/O ./O 
Communication/O Cost/O ARAN/O ,/O SAODV/O ,/O and/O our/O SEAODV/O are/O similar/O in/O the/O way/O of/O discovering/O routes/O ./O 
RREQ/M is/O broadcast/O by/O the/O originator/O of/O the/O on-demand/O node/O towards/O the/O destination/O ./O 
Upon/O receiving/O the/O RREQ/O ,/O destination/O unicasts/O the/O RREP/O back/O to/O the/O source/O from/O which/O the/O RREQ/M is/O generated/O by/O using/O the/O reverse/O path/O which/O has/O been/O set/O up/O during/O the/O flooding/O of/O the/O RREQ/O ./O 
All/O of/O these/O routing/O protocols/O apply/O the/O same/O methodology/O in/O their/O routing/O mechanisms/O ./O 
Therefore/O ,/O their/O communication/O costs/O -LRB-/O the/O number/O of/O routing/O messages/O -RRB-/O are/O the/O same/O ./O 
However/O ,/O ARAN/O ,/O SAODV/O ,/O and/O SEAODV/O experience/O various/O number/O of/O control/O bytes/O within/O RREQ/O and/O RREP/O ./O 
The/O more/O number/O of/O control/O bytes/O incurred/O in/O a/O single/O routing/O message/O ,/O the/O larger/O the/O entire/O routing/O message/O ./O 
Therefore/O ,/O routing/O message/O with/O bigger/O size/O in/O terms/O of/O bytes/O tends/O to/O have/O a/O lower/O probability/O of/O successful/O reception/O at/O the/O destination/O and/O suffer/O longer/O delay/O ./O 
Before/O computing/O the/O latency/O produced/O by/O the/O communication/O overhead/O for/O each/O of/O the/O routing/O protocols/O mentioned/O above/O ,/O the/O following/O assumptions/O are/O made/O :/O 1/O -RRB-/O Network/O throughput/O is/O 400/O Kbps/O for/O a/O single/O flow/O 3/O -RRB-/O In/O ARAN/O ,/O the/O size/O of/O RREQ/O or/O RREP/M generated/O by/O the/O source/O or/O destination/O is/O smaller/O than/O those/O forwarded/O by/O intermediate/O nodes/O ,/O which/O include/O two/O signatures/O and/O two/O certificates/O ./O 
While/O the/O RREQ/M or/O RREP/M originates/O by/O either/O the/O source/O or/O destination/O is/O only/O comprised/O of/O one/O signature/O and/O one/O certificate/O ./O 
Presume/O that/O the/O route/O discovery/O packet/O -LRB-/O RDP/M -RRB-/O in/O ARAN/O is/O the/O same/O size/O as/O that/O of/O used/O in/O AODV/O ,/O which/O is/O 24/O bytes/O ./O 
Therefore/O ,/O for/O RREQ/M and/O RREP/M with/O single/O signature/O and/O certificate/O ,/O the/O total/O size/O is/O 312/O bytes/O which/O is/O the/O same/O as/O that/O of/O in/O SAODV/O given/O below/O ./O 
For/O RREQ/O or/O RREP/M with/O double/O signatures/O and/O double/O certificates/O ,/O the/O total/O size/O is/O extended/O to/O 568/O bytes/O 4/O -RRB-/O In/O SAODV/O ,/O 312/O bytes/O in/O total/O for/O both/O RREQ/O and/O RREP/M ,/O which/O include/O original/O AODV/M message/O -LRB-/O 24/O bytes/O -RRB-/O ,/O signature/O -LRB-/O 128/O bytes/O -RRB-/O ,/O top/O hash/O -LRB-/O 16/O bytes/O -RRB-/O ,/O hash/O -LRB-/O 16/O bytes/O -RRB-/O and/O certificate/O -LRB-/O 128/O bytes/O -RRB-/O 5/O -RRB-/O In/O SEAODV/O ,/O there/O are/O totally/O 40/O bytes/O for/O either/O RREQ/O or/O RREP/M ./O 
The/O AODV/O message/O costs/O 24/O bytes/O and/O the/O HMAC/O is/O 16/O bytes/O ./O 
There/O are/O two/O routing/O messages/O in/O ARAN/O with/O single/O signature/O ,/O others/O are/O double/O signatures/O ./O 
The/O total/O number/O of/O bytes/O required/O to/O be/O transmitted/O in/O order/O to/O ensure/O a/O secure/O route/O set/O up/O is/O bytes/O ./O 
In/O SAODV/O ,/O all/O routing/O messages/O are/O the/O same/O size/O ,/O hence/O the/O total/O number/O of/O bytes/O required/O 568/O ×/O -LRB-/O N/O ?/O 2/O -RRB-/O ×/O 2/O +312/O ×/O 2/O to/O be/O transmitted/O is/O 312/O ×/O -LRB-/O N/O ?/O 2/O -RRB-/O ×/O 2/O +/O 312/O ×/O 2/O bytes/O ./O 
Similarly/O ,/O the/O total/O number/O of/O bytes/O of/O SEAODV/O incurred/O during/O the/O route/O set/O up/O process/O is/O 40/O ×/O -LRB-/O N/O ?/O 2/O -RRB-/O ×/O 2/O +40/O ×/O 2/O bytes/O ./O 
Therefore/O ,/O the/O number/O of/O RREQ/O and/O RREP/O incurred/O during/O the/O entire/O route/O setup/O process/O can/O be/O derived/O for/O ARAN/O ,/O SAODV/O and/O SEAODV/O ./O

The/O number/O of/O bytes/O that/O are/O required/O to/O be/O transmitted/O in/O order/O to/O safely/O setup/O a/O route/O for/O ARAN/O ,/O SAODV/O and/O SEAODV/O can/O be/O computed/O ./O 
The/O communication/O cost/O of/O transmitting/O those/O required/O bits/O can/O be/O calculated/O below/O :/O Now/O the/O average/O route/O acquisition/O latency/O can/O be/O derived/O by/O using/O the/O following/O equation/O :/O Average/O Route/O Acquisition/O Latency/O #NAAM/O ?/O 
The/O following/O Tables/O 4/O ,/O 5/O ,/O and/O 6/O summarize/O the/O total/O cost/O required/O to/O safely/O setup/O a/O route/O between/O a/O source/O and/O a/O destination/O for/O the/O three/O routing/O protocols/O in/O terms/O of/O route/O acquisition/O latency/O in/O millisecond/O ./O 
The/O average/O route/O acquisition/O latency/O -LRB-/O the/O total/O computation/O and/O communication/O costs/O -RRB-/O is/O defined/O as/O the/O average/O delay/O between/O sending/O a/O RREQ/M packet/O by/O a/O source/O for/O discovering/O a/O route/O to/O a/O destination/O and/O the/O receipt/O of/O the/O first/O corresponding/O RREP/O ./O ''/O 
Introduction/O ''/O A/O botnet/O is/O a/O coordinated/O group/O of/O compromised/O machines/O controlled/O via/O Command/O &/O Control/O -LRB-/O C&C/O -RRB-/O communication/O channels/O that/O are/O connected/O to/O some/O C/O &/O C/O servers/peers/O and/O managed/O by/O botmasters/botherders/O ./O 
It/O can/O be/O used/O in/O performing/O various/O malicious/O activities/O like/O sending/O spam/O mails/O ,/O distributed/O denial-of-service/O -LRB-/O DDoS/O -RRB-/O attacks/O ,/O phishing/O attacks/O and/O click/O frauds/O 1/O -RRB-/O Bots/O exchange/O binary/O and/O configuration/O updates/O with/O each/O other/O ./O 
P2P/O Zeus/O bots/O check/O the/O responsiveness/O of/O their/O neighbors/O every/O 30/O minutes/O ./O 
Each/O neighbor/O is/O contacted/O in/O turn/O ,/O and/O given/O 5/O opportunities/O to/O reply/O ./O

One/O of/O the/O largest/O social/O networking/O botnet/O is/O KOOBFACE/O 1/O -RRB-/O A/O bot/O is/O a/O program/O and/O therefore/O has/O a/O limited/O set/O of/O commands/O and/O every/O command/O issued/O by/O a/O bot/O in/O its/O normal/O C/O &/O C/O operations/O is/O followed/O by/O a/O response/O from/O either/O a/O server/O in/O its/O hierarchy/O in/O the/O botnet/O or/O from/O some/O other/O bot/O in/O its/O peer/O group/O ./O

Fuzzification/O of/O each/O antecedent/O is/O done/O by/O testing/O all/O relevant/O values/O -LCB-/O x/O i/O |/O x/O =/O -LRB-/O x/O 1/O ·/O ·/O ·/O x/O k/O -RRB-/O ?/O D/O T/O i/O ,/O x/O i/O </O ?/O c/O ,/O L/O i/O -RCB-/O as/O candidates/O for/O ?/O s/O ,/O L/O i/O and/O for/O all/O values/O -LCB-/O x/O i/O |/O x/O =/O -LRB-/O x/O 1/O .../O x/O k/O -RRB-/O ?/O D/O T/O i/O ,/O x/O i/O >/O ?/O c/O ,/O U/O i/O -RCB-/O as/O candidates/O for/O ?/O s/O ,/O U/O i/O ./O 
Here/O ,/O relevant/O data/O for/O each/O antecedent/O -LRB-/O A/O i/O ?/O I/O i/O -RRB-/O is/O the/O one/O considered/O by/O ignoring/O all/O those/O instances/O that/O are/O excluded/O by/O any/O other/O antecedent/O -LRB-/O A/O j/O ?/O I/O F/O j/O -RRB-/O ,/O j/O =/O i/O :/O D/O i/O T/O =/O -LCB-/O x/O =/O -LRB-/O x/O 1/O .../O x/O k/O -RRB-/O ?/O D/O T/O |/O I/O F/O j/O -LRB-/O x/O j/O -RRB-/O >/O 0/O for/O all/O j/O =/O i/O -RCB-/O ?/O D/O T/O ./O 
FURIA/O being/O a/O fuzzy/M rule/M generating/M algorithm/M is/O characterized/O by/O its/O core/O and/O its/O support/O ./O 
It/O is/O valid/O inside/O the/O core/O and/O invalid/O outside/O the/O support/O in-between/O ,/O the/O validity/O drops/O in/O a/O gradual/O way/O ./O 
Apart/O from/O having/O this/O definite/O advantage/O of/O fuzzy/O rule/O generation/O over/O other/O conventional/O rule/O generation/O algorithms/O such/O as/O RIPPER/O and/O C4/O .5/O ,/O FURIA/O generates/O unordered/O rule/O set/O instead/O of/O rule/O lists/O and/O provides/O an/O efficient/O rule/O stretching/O method/O to/O deal/O with/O uncovered/O instances/O ./O

Its/O algorithm/O requires/O equilibrium/O between/O three/O constraints/O :/O imperceptibility/O ,/O robustness/O and/O embedding/O capacity/O Mathematical/M Recall/M of/O Radon/O Transform/O Generalized/O Radon/O Transform/O In/O 1917/O ,/O Radon/O ,/O Austrian/O mathematician/O ,/O defined/O the/O theory/O of/O Radon/O Transform/O ./O

``/O 7/O -RRB-/O After/O encrypting/O the/O watermark/O by/O using/O the/O function/O ''/O ''/O ''/O ''/O XOR/O ''/O ''/O ''/O ''/O ,/O we/O applied/O S/O max/O iteratively/O permutations/O on/O the/O encrypted/O watermark/O vector/O in/O order/O to/O improve/O the/O encryption/O system/O ./O

-LRB-/O 1/O -RRB-/O Certificate/O publishing/O The/O ant/O colony/O based/O routing/O is/O based/O on/O ants/O in/O order/O to/O establish/O and/O maintain/O routes/O over/O the/O network/O ./O

AntNET/O or/O ARA/M is/O based/O on/O the/O FANT/O in/O order/O to/O discover/O routes/O over/O the/O network/O this/O ant/O visits/O each/O node/O over/O the/O network/O deposing/O a/O kind/O of/O substance/O called/O pheromone/O used/O after/O to/O compute/O probability/O in/O order/O to/O evaluate/O routes/O ./O 
Our/O interest/O in/O this/O ant/O is/O that/O it/O visits/O each/O node/O over/O the/O network/O during/O the/O period/O of/O route/O discovery/O ,/O which/O makes/O it/O the/O preferred/O period/O to/O publish/O certificate/O ./O 
Our/O proposed/O solution/O to/O publish/O certificate/O is/O by/O using/O the/O FANT/O to/O handle/O the/O certificate/O publishing/O over/O the/O network/O ,/O thus/O we/O propose/O to/O create/O a/O new/O field/O in/O the/O FANT/M which/O will/O contain/O the/O certificate/O of/O the/O source/O node/O ./O 
Consequently/O ,/O each/O node/O when/O launches/O a/O route/O discovery/O ,/O it/O inserts/O its/O certificate/O into/O the/O FANT/M before/O launching/O it/O ./O 
As/O a/O result/O ,/O the/O certificate/O of/O the/O corresponding/O node/O is/O diffused/O over/O the/O entire/O network/O consequently/O each/O intermediate/O node/O retrieves/O from/O the/O FANT/O the/O certificate/O of/O the/O source/O node/O and/O saves/O it/O in/O the/O corresponding/O directory/O for/O future/O use/O ,/O in/O the/O same/O process/O of/O route/O discovery/O each/O intermediate/O node/O use/O the/O FANT/M as/O support/O to/O transfer/O its/O certificate/O to/O its/O neighbors/O ./O

For/O this/O reason/O each/O node/O ,/O keeps/O a/O revocation/O list/O where/O it/O saves/O the/O revoked/O certificate/O ,/O the/O certificate/O revocation/O list/O is/O updated/O by/O an/O accusation/O mechanisms/O defined/O by/O AntPKI/O ./O 
Since/O ,/O in/O AntPKI/O each/O node/O when/O detects/O any/O malicious/O attention/O from/O a/O neighboring/O node/O using/O an/O underlying/O intrusion/O detection/O system/O ,/O it/O sends/O an/O accusation/O request/O which/O contains/O the/O certificate/O of/O that/O node/O otherwise/O if/O it/O has/O not/O its/O certificate/O it/O send/O an/O accusation/O with/O the/O IP/O or/O MAC/O address/O of/O that/O node/O ./O

``/O 3/O -RRB-/O If/O there/O are/O more/O then/O one/O bad/O signature/O in/O the/O batch/O x/O ,/O DBI/M basic/M -LRB-/O x/O -RRB-/O returns/O ''/O ''/O ''/O ''/O false/O ''/O ''/O ''/O ''/O -LRB-/O This/O is/O the/O reason/O for/O the/O test/O GT/O -LRB-/O x/O -LRB-/O m/O k/O ,/O s/O k/O -RRB-/O -RRB-/O -RRB-/O ./O ''/O

10/O ET/O -LRB-/O -RRB-/O V/O ON/O for/O determining/O the/O referencing/O neighbors/O for/O each/O embedding/O vertex/O ./O 
The/O proposed/O algorithm/O adopts/O a/O modified/O breadth/O first/O search/O scheme/O that/O explores/O all/O edges/O of/O the/O polygonal/O model/O to/O determine/O the/O referencing/O neighbors/O ./O 
Thus/O ,/O the/O complexity/O is/O only/O -LRB-/O -RRB-/O E/O ON/O ,/O whether/O E/O N/O is/O the/O number/O of/O edges/O in/O the/O cover/O model/O ./O 
However/O ,/O the/O proposed/O technique/O lowers/O the/O number/O of/O the/O referencing/O neighbors/O for/O each/O embedding/O vertex/O at/O approximately/O half/O of/O the/O actual/O neighbors/O ./O 
Despite/O this/O ,/O the/O referencing/O ratio/O is/O still/O superior/O to/O that/O of/O Cheng/O and/O Wang/M 's/M algorithm/M ./O 
Conclusions/O This/O study/O proposes/O an/O adaptive/O information/O hiding/M algorithm/M for/O polygonal/O models/O ./O 
The/O main/O point/O of/O this/O algorithm/O is/O to/O use/O a/O modified/O BFS/M method/M to/O efficiently/O derive/O the/O referencing/O neighbors/O for/O each/O embeddable/O vertex/O ./O 
Thereafter/O ,/O the/O surface/O complexity/O of/O the/O embedding/O vertex/O is/O then/O estimated/O by/O the/O distance/O from/O the/O center/O of/O the/O referencing/O neighbors/O ./O 
Different/O amounts/O of/O secret/O messages/O are/O embedded/O according/O to/O the/O surface/O properties/O of/O each/O vertex/O ./O 
To/O decrease/O the/O model/O distortion/O caused/O by/O a/O large/O embedding/O capacity/O ,/O a/O constant/O threshold/O is/O employed/O to/O control/O the/O maximum/O embedding/O capacity/O for/O each/O vertex/O ./O 
The/O proposed/O algorithm/O can/O provide/O a/O higher/O embedding/O capacity/O ,/O higher/O robustness/O ,/O and/O a/O lower/O model/O distortion/O under/O acceptable/O estimation/O accuracy/O ./O 
Most/O importantly/O ,/O the/O performance/O for/O determining/O the/O referencing/O neighbors/O of/O each/O embeddable/O vertex/O can/O be/O significantly/O improved/O ./O 
With/O the/O help/O of/O experimental/O results/O ,/O this/O study/O demonstrates/O the/O feasibility/O of/O this/O technique/O for/O 3D/O adaptive/O information/O hiding/O ./O ''/O 
Introduction/O ''/O The/O most/O important/O contribution/O of/O modern/O cryptography/O is/O the/O invention/O of/O a/O way/O to/O create/O digital/O signatures/O ./O 
A/O digital/O signature/O is/O an/O electronic/O analogue/O of/O a/O written/O signature/O to/O be/O used/O by/O the/O recipient/O or/O a/O third/O party/O to/O identity/O of/O the/O signatory/O or/O to/O verify/O the/O integrity/O of/O the/O data/O ./O

``/O Throughout/O this/O paper/O ,/O the/O implied/O constant/O in/O the/O symbol/O ''/O ''/O ''/O ''/O ''/O ''/O ''/O ''/O is/O absolute/O ./O ''/O 
Theorem/O 2/O ./O

Proof/O ./O
